greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of times the smallest prime factor of n is a factor in all numbers <=n; a(1)=1.
comment: For n>1, a(n) = 1 iff n is prime.
a(n) = A078897(n) iff n is a prime power (A000961).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
mathematica: With[{s = Array[Flatten@ Map[ConstantArray[#1, #2] & @@ # &, FactorInteger[#]] &, 81]}, Array[Count[Take[s, #1], #2, 2] & @@ {#, s[[#, 1]]} &, Length@ s]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 16 2017 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==1, 1, my(p = factor(n)[1, 1]); sum(i=1, n, valuation(i, p))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 27 2014
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 12 2002
